title: JAGS core rules and addons
description:

Notes:
The original JAGS ruleset has not been included. Only the Revised version and JAGS2
Several things have been added multiple times. That&#039;s because I&#039;m a lazy bastard and didn&#039;t bother to properly organize the directory when I created the torrent.
